text: Is there a way to stop the renaming of modules in the page editor?
Hey <@U06DDNTH9DE>, do you mean via the sidebar? If so, I might be wrong but unfortunately it's not possible since this feature comes directly from HS and is not accessible to users
Yes, when you have modules on a page you can click the 3 dots in the sidebar and rename the module.
yeah - unfortunately not possible to my knowledge. It's an UX feature so you cannot disable it
Damn, thanks for this.
your welcome
Hi guys. Do you know is it possible to define Quote Template with predefined products?
you mean from HubSpots Product Library?
Hi <@UBT0AHWLD>, Yes

:HubSpotheart:*Help your fellow HubSpot Developers!*:HubSpotheart:

This Slack lives and breathes by its community. If you're posting a question, take a moment and click around a few channels to see if there are any questions you can help answer. Instant karma!
thanks for the tips, im playing around with some script now to try to create that timeout on the submission. fingers crossed i can get that to work!
good luck, if you run into issues paste code here and I can help when I have a moment, I have a mess load of meetings for rest of day so I may be in and out
Only way I can think of is to do it in a workflow (when new quote created, add products) but I hope there's a better way

<@U25PYL3Q8> tried adding this code to the footer of our <https://marketing.cloverleaf.me/referral-link-request|HS landing page> and still hitting issues.

```<script>
window.addEventListener('message', event => {
    if (event.data.type === 'hsFormCallback' && event.data.eventName === 'onFormSubmit') {
        event.preventDefault();
        setTimeout(() => {
            window.location.href = '<https://marketing.cloverleaf.me/referral-link-confirmation>';
        }, 5000);
    }
});
</script>```
I originally thought it was because I had the form set to redirect on submission, so I changed to "display message" but it doesnt seem to fire the redirect at all now. Any insight? I'm using the new form builder but also tested with the legacy builder and got the same result.

Any other advice on something I may be overlooking? Really really appreciate the help.

And please DM me your email, i owe you a coffee for taking some time to help me out here!
I used hbspt.forms.create({ as the way to do it
I thought I had something I could send you quickly, this isn’t really great but you might be able to modify it
this would have to be old form, and using the script to embed it, then you could take your form field in the module to fill in the portal and form id
documetnation has a bit more info in it: <https://web.archive.org/web/20230331200206/https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/advanced_form_options#tab-1>
that page loads slow
<@U055T1Z3R7B>, in the Line Items Table, you can choose "Select from product library"
Several years later, I am seeking this solution now. I see that idea is not planned. Did you ever come up with a workaround?
Hi guys, Is it possible to pull from the HubSpot API a link to the email sent from one of the campaigns?
you want a link to your externally viewed email? You want a link to the campaign? A link from inside the email? Can you provide some more detail so I can help better
Hi guys, is there a possible way to integrate HubSpot in our payment app? we're building similar to stripe.

Hey there! We use <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/reference/api/conversations/chat-widget-sdk|HubSpot's chat> inside our platform and identify contacts according to <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/api/conversations/visitor-identification|Visitor identification> article.

Could you tell me if it is possible to update several properties of the identified contact when the chat widget was uploaded?
